  ~ The Traditional and Modern Japanese Sword Forging Compilation ~

Various pdf document on Forging a Japanese style sword (katana).

With the enclosed information, one should be able to create a forge-folded katana,of high quality. (Were not talking about making a cheap mall knock offs!) Also included is some basic plans for a small propane powered forge. Enjoy and remember...Share Knowledge! -FTP

Credits: 

FTP - Compiler, 

Walter Sorrell: www.waltersorrells.com/blades/ - Modern Katana,

Michael Morimoto/Colorado School of Mines/www.forging.org  - Traditional Katana,

James Riser:www.jamesriser.com - Propane Forge
